spec_data.Name: tharlon-fonts
spec_data.Description:
TharLon is an authentic Myanmar typeface which covers several languages, such
as Burmese, Mon, Shan, Karen, Pa'o, Asho Chin, Kayah and Karenni, for use on
the web and in all other digital typography software. The name TharLon was
the name of the King who standardized the units of measurement during the
ancient Burmese Kingdom Era.

The TharLon font is designed by Ngwe Tun, and distributed under the SIL
Open Font License with the Reserved Font Name 'TharLon'.
